name: Lost Lands (itch)
description:
Lost Lands is an action roguelike created for Mini Jam 39, I only ended up with about 18 hours to work on it because of irl commitments. I tried out a few new work generation algorithms and a new weapon system, I think the result turned out quite well and I will probably push out a few updates in the coming weeks for anyone who is interested.

Controls

E - Pickup Weapon

WASD - Movement

Right Mouse Button - Shoot

Known Bugs

- None currently
